newsitem.title: USA: Cellegy drug delivery system gets patent.
newsitem.headline: Cellegy drug delivery system gets patent.

text.p: Cellegy Pharmaceuticals Inc said it was awarded a U.S. patent for its drug delivery system designed to facilitate the transdermal and topical delivery of drugs for systemic and skin diseases.
It said its system works by biochemically manipulating the skin's permeability barrier.
The company said that while there are currently only nine drugs approved for transdermal delivery through skin patches, its system could potentially deliver "several additional drugs."
